articles.author: James Brinsford
articles.title: Love Island's Davide breaks silence after taxi ride with girls while Ekin-Su is away - The Mirror
articles.description: Love Island winner Davide Sanclimenti has broken his silence after he was seen heading from a boxing match with two girls in a taxi while Ekin-Su works in America
articles.content:
Davide Sanclimenti has broken his silence after he was seen getting into a taxi with two girls following a boxing match at the weekend 
 The 27-year-old Love Island winner had headed to the KSI boxi… [+2368 chars]

articles.author: Alice Yan
articles.title: 'Fake Americano' to cope with heatwave: doctors in China warn against using traditional Chinese medicine to create 'risky' trendy drink - The Star Online
articles.description: Doctors in China have warned against a new trend of mixing a traditional Chinese medicine (TCM) liquid with iced water to what fans say looks and tastes like an iced Americano as a way to cool down during the country’s ongoing record heatwave.
